title: ISic001574. Fragmentary funerary inscription
body:
Facsimile Images

[---]οιοδιο[---]

Apparatus criticus

Text after Brugnone; Manni Piraino, [οἴμ]οι ὀ͂ Διο

translation

commentary

It is tempting to restore the typical Selinuntine formula of οἴμοι ὀ͂ + vocative, but caution is advised by Brugnone

bibliography

  • 96 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000531
  • Brugnone 2006 C1 tav.14.67 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002115
